info.title: MClass Course Management API
info.description: API documentation for MClass course management system

get.description: Retrieve attendance records for a specific course with automatic roster generation if needed

post.description: Mark attendance for multiple students in a course at once

put.description: Update attendance status for a specific student in a course

post.description: Automatically generate attendance roster for all registered students in a course

message.example: 成功生成 25 筆出席記錄

get.description: Retrieve attendance statistics for a specific member with optional filters

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for date range filter

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for date range filter

get.description: Retrieve attendance statistics for a specific course
Retrieve list of all available attendance status options

post.summary: 會員註冊（需先完成 Email 驗證）

requestBody.description: 會員註冊資料，包含必填的 member 和 profile，以及可選的 contact 和關聯資料

contact.description: 聯絡資訊（可選，若填寫 mobile 則需先完成 SMS 驗證）

mobile.description: 手機號碼（唯一，需先完成 SMS 驗證）

known_langs.description: 所具備的語言專長 IDs（可選）

learning_langs.description: 欲學習的語言別 IDs（可選）

highest_educations.description: 最高學歷 ID（可選，最多1個）

get.description: Retrieve a list of all club course instances with their course info

post.summary: Create a new club course instance
post.description: Create a new club course session with schedule details. Automatically sends notifications to course followers.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific club course instance

put.description: Update an existing club course session. Sends notifications if time or location changes.

delete.description: Delete a specific club course session from the system

get.description: Retrieve a list of all club course information with schedules and related club courses

details.example: This course covers variables, loops, and functions

post.description: Create a new club course info entry with optional periodic schedules. Automatically generates club courses based on schedules or total sessions.

details.example: This course covers variables, loops, and functions

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific club course including schedules and club courses

details.example: This course covers variables, loops, and functions

put.description: Update an existing club course info. Regenerates club courses if schedules or total_sessions are modified.

delete.description: Delete a club course info entry and all related schedules and club courses (cascade delete)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all members with their profiles, contacts, and all related background information through pivot tables

post.description: Create a new member with profile, contact, and background information using pivot tables. All background fields are optional arrays of type IDs.

requestBody.description: Member data including required member and profile objects, optional contact and background relation arrays

201.description: Member created successfully with all relations

items.example: The member.email has already been taken.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific member including profile, contact, background, and related language/level types

referral_sources.description: 哪裡知道我們的來源種類

put.description: Update an existing member's information including profile, contact, and background data. All fields are optional - only provide fields you want to update.

requestBody.description: Member data to update (all fields optional)

known_langs.description: 所具備的語言專長 IDs

referral_sources.description: 哪裡知道我們的來源種類 IDs
哪裡知道我們的來源種類

items.example: The member.email has already been taken.

delete.description: Delete a member and all associated profile, contact, and background information. This operation will cascade delete all related data including language and level associations.

get.description: Retrieve a member's schedule including courses and counseling appointments across different roles

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for schedule (defaults to start of current week)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for schedule (defaults to end of current week)

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of roles to filter (student,teacher,assistant,counselor)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all menus with optional filtering. If role_id is provided, is_locked will be set based on permissions.

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Filter by parent ID (null for root menus)

parameters.name: role_id
parameters.description: Filter by role ID and set is_locked state

is_locked.description: False by default, or based on role if role_id provided

post.description: Create a new menu item with optional role assignments

visible_to_all.description: Show menu to all users (locked if no permission)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific menu

put.description: Update an existing menu's information

visible_to_all.description: Show menu to all users (locked if no permission)

delete.description: Delete a specific menu (children will be cascade deleted)

get.description: Retrieve only active menus
Retrieve hierarchical menu tree structure. If role_id is provided, is_locked will be set based on permissions.

parameters.name: role_id
parameters.description: Role ID to determine is_locked state

is_locked.description: False by default, or based on role if role_id provided

get.summary: Get menu tree for specific role
get.description: Retrieve hierarchical menu tree filtered by role access. Menus with 'visible_to_all' set to true will be shown to all users but marked as 'is_locked' if the user doesn't have permission.

is_locked.description: True if menu is visible but user doesn't have permission

post.description: Assign one or more roles to a menu (replaces existing roles)

delete.description: Remove one or more roles from a menu

put.description: Update display_order for multiple menus at once
